programme.sub-title: The Case of the Perfect Husband
programme.desc: An art dealer warns his wife about being his eighth murder victim.

programme.sub-title: A Crooked Man

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Speckled Band

programme.sub-title: The Blue Carbuncle
programme.desc: Holmes investigates when a famous gem known as the Blue Carbuncle is stolen.

programme.title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Sign of Four
programme.desc: Mary Morstan has received a pearl in the post every year since her father's disappearance. When she is summoned to meet her mysterious benefactor, Holmes and Watson accompany her - leading to the truth about a secret pact.

programme.title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
programme.sub-title: The Devil's Foot

programme.sub-title: The Case of the Laughing Mummy
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes helps one of Dr. Watson's old friends but in doing so uncovers a serious mystery.

programme.sub-title: The Case of the Thistle Killer
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes helps Scotland Yard track down a killer who has been leaving behind three thistles.

programme.sub-title: The Case of the Christmas Pudding

programme.sub-title: The Case of the Night Train Riddle

programme.sub-title: The Copper Beeches
programme.desc: A woman gets a job offer that requires her to cut her chestnut hair and sit by a window.

programme.sub-title: The Norwood Builder

programme.sub-title: The Mazarin Stone
